item.title: CVE-2012-2979|2024-08-06T19:50:05.462Z -- nsd3 -- nsd3
item.description: FreeBSD NSD before 3.2.13 allows remote attackers to crash a NSD child server process (SIGSEGV) and cause a denial of service in the NSD server.
